about_the_game:
Faced with the circumstances of his family and disappointments of the world, Kev enters his final semester of college, studying Computer Science with the goal to get a financially stable job. He yearns for a lost simplicity, a time where things were a bit simpler and might’ve felt right. In a chance encounter with Vivi, a girl from the drama department, he’s given a flier to a theatrical performance – her last performance before she also graduates that semester.

Though their time left as students is fleeting, the two continue to walk their different but interwoven paths, as they discover and embrace the beauty in their shimmering but fading moments as students.

Our Ephemeral Nights Demo is a free to play, romance and drama visual novel made with the Ren'Py Visual Novel Engine.

Demo Features

  • Available for Windows, Linux, and Mac

  • 6 Original Tracks

  • 7.8k Words

  • 3 CG's

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu / SteamOS
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX or OpenGL compatible card
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.6-10.14
  • Processor: 1 Ghz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Game is non-notarized. May not work with 10.15 Catalina

short_description: As he enters his final semester of college, Kev continues to wonder if there’s something more to the future he’s carving out for himself. After a chance encounter with Vivi, an aspiring voice actor also in her final semester, he experiences the beautiful and fleeting days before his graduation.
